description: Single storey rear extension, part first floor rear extension, alteration to existing bay window
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): A0001 REV A (LOCATION PLANS); A1001 REV A (GROUND PLAN - EXISTING); A1002 REV A (FIRST FLOOR PLAN - EXISTING); A1003 REV A (LOFT FLOOR PLAN - EXISTING); A1004 REV A (SITE PLAN - EXISTING); A1005 REV A (GROUND FLOOR PLAN - PROPOSED); A1006 REV A (FIRST FLOOR PLAN - PROPOSED); A1008 REV A (SITE PLAN - PROPOSED); A2001 REV A (FRONT ELEVATION - EXISTING); A2002 REV A (REAR ELEVATION - EXISTING); A2003 REV A (RIGHT ELEVATION - EXISTING); A2004 REV A (LEFT ELEVATION - EXISTING); A2005 REV A (FRONT ELEVATION - PROPOSED); A2006 REV A (REAR ELEVATION - PROPOSED); A2007 REV A (RIGHT ELEVATION - PROPOSED); A2008 REV A (LEFT ELEVATION - PROPOSED); A3001 REV A (SECTION - EXISTING); A3002 REV A (SECTION - PROPOSED); A3003 REV A (3D SECTION - EXISTING); A3004 REV A (3D SECTION - PROPOSED); A3005 REV A (3D SECTION - EXISTING); A3006 REV A (3D SECTION - PROPOSED); DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
